alert.note: Alert for Lea (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 7:10PM MDT until September 26 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lea County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 815 PM MDT. * At 710 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles west of McDonald, or 16 miles northwest of Lovington, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Lea County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
